content.rendered:
Our Products

We are very proud to be working with innovators and leaders in the 3D printing and 3D scanning industries to bring you the best 3D technologies on the market.

Our product range includes

  • 3D Scanners
  • 3D Design Tools and Software
  • 3D Printers
  • 3D Printing Materials

shop now contact us

Phone

03 9687 8638

Address

7A Kent Street,
Yarraville, VIC 3013
Australia.
